categories: Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial Star Destroyer was fitted with a prototype superlaser.

The ship was equipped with power generation facilities capable of feeding a weapon that could pulverize a large asteroid. It was propelled by four thrusters.
The ship had a split down the middle similar to the ancient Harrower-class dreadnought and the later superlaser-equipped Conqueror. In addition, it also possessed flaps similar to that of a Victory-class Star Destroyer.
It was used against a gathering of early resistance leaders on a remote asteroid, wiping most of them out before they could become a serious threat to the Empire.
